body:
I'm considering releasing my resource pack to the public because I'm getting constant requests. However, none of the textures are mine; I combined textures from a bunch of other packs and put into one. I'm worried about things like copyright, plagiarism, etc.

Any help? Should I release it or not?
body_tagged:
I'm considering releasing my resource pack to the public because I'm getting constant requests. However, none of the textures are mine; I combined textures from a bunch of other packs and put into one. I'm worried about things like copyright, plagiarism, etc.

Any help? Should I release it or not?
title: Question about Texture Pack Releases

replies.body:
I think it would be fine. Some people Make reformed Texture packs, or Just use the swords, Texture, etc from a pack. 

I'm not sure, but I think it would be ok
